attributes.action: Keep the England Flag Red and White on the England Football Team Jersey
attributes.additional_details: It is a National Flag issue.... no one else but our government and the countries people should decide on this.
attributes.background: The changing of colours on our National Flag on the England Football Jersey is not a choice for the designers to make. This is our Countries official Flag, if a designing company from England wanted to change another teams national colours there would be outrage!

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the England football kit are a matter for the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.
